name: Hearty Pumpkin-White Bean Soup
author: Voskos
summary: Ground cumin and grated fresh ginger give this pumpkin-bean soup a touch of class. Serve the creamy blended recipe as a main dish or side dish. A swirl of yogurt and a sprinkling of pepitas (pumpkin seeds) finish the bowl.
ingredients: 3 cups vegetable or chicken broth or stock
1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini (white kidney) beans, rinsed and drained
1 (5.3 ounce) container VOSKOS® Nonfat Honey Greek Yogurt
directions: Cook ginger and cumin in hot vegetable oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until fragrant
Add the vegetable broth, cannellini beans, pumpkin, and salt
Remove from heat and puree until smooth with an immersion blender
Set aside 1/4 cup of VOSKOS® Nonfat Honey Greek Yogurt to use as topper
Ladle into bowls; top each with a tablespoon of the reserved yogurt, swirling with a knife
